skillTree.name: Cauldron of Blood
skillTree.description: Not a single Executioner have been granted one of these gifts of Khaine previously, Crone Hellebron has made an exception with Tullaris however, a fitting reward for his military contributions.

skillTree.name: Sadistic
skillTree.description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.

skillTree.name: Eternal Hatred
skillTree.description: The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.name: Greater Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

skillTree.name: Sacred Slaughterer
skillTree.description: Every ritual execution that Tullaris performs serves as a glorious offering to Khaine, driving the other Executioners he leads to match his skill and devotion with further slaughter.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.name: The Dread Master
skillTree.description: "We dominate the seas of the world because they are ours to do with as we will. Our weak willed cousins once held all the oceans in their grasp, but allowed them to slip away as they declined into decadence. Not so, our forces. We strike where and when we will, leaving no doubt who are the true masters of the seas. We make slaves of the lesser races because they are fit for nothing else. It is only just that they should strive for their betters."

skillTree.name: Infamous and Feared
skillTree.description: The merest rumour that Tullaris and his Executioners are part of an invading Dark Elf army can cause floods of refugees to flee before the Druchii forces and in battle, enemies rout rather than face Tullaris and his deadly warriors.

skillTree.name: Leader of Executioners
skillTree.description: Under his command, the Executioners have partaken in such cold-blooded destruction that they have gained a fearful reputation across the world. Beneath their banner they march at the head of the army, eagerly seeking battle.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +8 for Har Ganeth Executioners units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Har Ganeth Executioners units
	(Lord's army)

Passive ability: "Deathblow" for Har Ganeth Executioners
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Brides of Khaine
skillTree.description: Witch Elves will often follow the Dreadbringer, for death and favour of Khaine usually follows wherever Tullaris goes.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +12% for embedded Death Hags and Witch Elves units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for embedded Death Hags and Witch Elves units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -30% for embedded Death Hags, Har Ganeth Executioners and Witch Elves units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Hand of Khaine
skillTree.description: His life has been punctuated by a bloody behaviour ever since he first heard the calling of Khaine.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Murderous Supremacy"
	(replaces: "Murderous Prowess and Murderous Mastery")
	(Lord's army)

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -30% for embedded Death Hags, Har Ganeth Executioners and Witch Elves units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dance of Death
skillTree.description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Conviction
skillTree.description: Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Impassioned
skillTree.description: There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Fervour
skillTree.description: This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Line Breaker
skillTree.description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords, Black Ark Corsairs and Darkshards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords, Black Ark Corsairs and Darkshards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords, Black Ark Corsairs and Darkshards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords, Black Ark Corsairs and Darkshards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords, Black Ark Corsairs and Darkshards units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sheafmaster
skillTree.description: Marshalling missile troops effectively - even elites - is all about timing.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Raid Leader
skillTree.description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +3 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlock and Scourgerunner Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Shades, Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlock and Scourgerunner Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Shades, Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lash Master
skillTree.description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +9% for Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +12% for Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Knight Lord
skillTree.description: The ability to command the savage, untamed Cold Ones should not be underestimated - not everyone has the knack!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Slaughterlord
skillTree.description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cull the Unworthy
skillTree.description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ravager Rewards
skillTree.description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +15% for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Favour the Fortunate
skillTree.description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

effects.description:
Armour: +5 for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Confer Bloodlust
skillTree.description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Great Warrior
skillTree.description: "Let your name be on the lips of every man and woman; your great deeds go before you!"

skillTree.name: Dreaded Slaver
skillTree.description: This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Infamous Raider
skillTree.description: If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Fleeting Shadow
skillTree.description: Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Chosen of Khaine
backgroundSkills.description: "Lord Khaine. I send you this meagre offering, the first of many, on your night, Death Night. Let this be a sign of the compact between us, and lend your strength to me. Let the murders I commit this night be in your name and for your glory."

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for embedded Death Hags, Har Ganeth Executioners and Witch Elves units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Causes Fear for embedded Death Hags, Har Ganeth Executioners and Witch Elves units
	(Lord's army)
